text:
{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"1","subject":"Research README best practices from banesullivan/README","description":"Deep dive on https://github.com/banesullivan/README repository. Extract:
- Main principles for great READMEs
- Structure recommendations
- Common patterns and anti-patterns
- Key sections that should be included

Produce a comprehensive summary of best practices.","assignedBy":"readme-researcher","timestamp":"2026-02-10T11:55:31.857Z"}

{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"2","subject":"Analyze inspiring README examples","description":"Review the "Examples that inspire me" section from https://github.com/banesullivan/README. For each example:
- Identify what makes it effective
- Note structural elements used
- Extract patterns worth emulating
- Document specific techniques (badges, diagrams, TOC, etc.)

Create a reference guide of effective README patterns.","assignedBy":"readme-researcher","timestamp":"2026-02-10T11:56:16.180Z"}
